name: Slime Hunter: Wild Impact
description:
Slime Hunter Grand Open!
Come see what surprise gift Slime Hunter has for celebrating global launch!

[Game Features]
Instant rise to 1B Combat Power!
Race to Build the Strongest Character in this Super Fast, Super Fun RPG!
■ Max Level in the Blink of an Eye!
So many different ways to reach Max Level in an instant!
Party up with AI Friends to accelerate your progress!
Craft all sorts of equipment to deal MASSIVE damage!
■ Pixel Art at its Finest!
2D side-scrolling play meets pixelated graphics!
Captivating graphics and flashy skills!
Indulge in this once-in-a-lifetime experience in Slime Hunter!
■ Unique Play Modes
Test your limits in the infinite Boss Raid!
Think you got what it takes? Engage in the Hermes Stock Market System!
Brand-new Play Modes are waiting for you!

Language support: English, 한국어, 中文繁體, and ไทย!

* Access permission notice for gameplay
[Optional Permissions]
- Camera: The permission is required to take profile pictures.
- Photos: The permission is required to save/load game screens and change profile pictures.
- Notifications: The permission is required to send you push notifications regarding the game.
- IDFA: Permission is required to use Identifier for Advertisers (IDFA) for targeted advertising and tracking analysis.
※ You'll be able to enjoy the service except features related to above authorities even if you don't give permission to the above.

[Manually Setting Permissions]
- Device Settings> Select the corresponding app> Choose either to enable/disable access

[Minimum System Requirements]
- iPhone 6S
* Please free up at least 10MB of storage space to store game data.
